numericalExperiment.rationale: ESM Pre-Industrial coupled atmosphere ocean control run. Imposes non-evolving pre-industrial conditions as in 3.1_pi-control but emissions-forced (with atmosperhic CO2 determined by the model itself)
numericalExperiment.Why: Control for exploring the impact of climate-carbon cycle coupling in quantifying the carbon cycle feedback on projected climated change.
